skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, crafting intuitive, visually appealing interfaces for enhanced user experience.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Proficient in C# and .NET, building robust, scalable server-side applications for secure and efficient data handling.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: Experienced in SQL (SQL Server), ensuring efficient data storage, retrieval, and manipulation for data-driven applications.

skills.title: DevOps/AI Tools
skills.description: Hands-on experience with DevOps tools like Jenkins and GitHub, and AI Tools like OpenAI API for streamlined software development.

portfolio.title: Project A
portfolio.description: A robust and scalable web application developed using .NET framework, showcasing my expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies.

portfolio.title: Project B
portfolio.description: An interactive dashboard built with React.js, demonstrating my proficiency in front-end development and user interface design.

portfolio.title: Project C
portfolio.description: A database-driven application powered by SQL Server, showcasing my expertise in database design and management.
